power.name: Arclance
power.text: Deal X energy damage to a target, where X = 1 + the number of Charge cards next to Dauntless / 2 (round down)

ul.li: One player may draw a card now
Reduce all energy damage dealt to hero targets by 1 until your next turn
Select an equipment card. Until your next turn, it is indestructible

card.name: Arcshield
card.power: Until the end of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to Dauntless by X, where X = 1 + the number of Charge cards next to this card / 2 (round down)

card.name: Arcstep
card.power:
Draw X cards, where X = 1 + the number of Charge cards next to this card / 2 (round down).
You may play a card

card.name: Charge
card.text: When you play this card, either place it next to Dauntless or next to a Relic. This card is indestructible

card.name: Plasma Core
card.text:
When you play this card, either place it next to Dauntless or next to a Relic, but only if they do not already have a card with the same name next to them.
If next to Dauntless, his Arclance does irreducible damage.
If next to the Arcshield, whenever a non-hero target would deal damage to Dauntless and it is reduced by the Arcshield's power, Dauntless deals that target 1 energy damage.
If next to the Arcstep, Dauntless regains 1 HP whenever he uses the Arcstep's power

card.name: Matter to Energy
card.text:
When you play this card, either place it next to Dauntless or next to a Relic, but only if they do not already have a card with the same name next to them.
If next to Dauntless, you may choose what damage type his Arclance does when it is used.
If next to the Arcshield, when its power is used, pick an energy type. Until the end of your next turn, reduce all damage of that type by 1.
If next to the Arcstep, when its power is used, Dauntless deals up to 3 targets 1 energy damage

card.name: To Me!
card.text: Search your deck for a Relic and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. Draw a card. You may play a card

card.name: Outfitting
card.text: Select a hero. That hero reveals cards from the top of their deck until they reveal an Equipment card. They may put that card into play or into their hand. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into their deck

card.name: Resolve
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your trash until you reveal a Charge card. You may put it into play or into your hand

card.name: Your Opponent Is Me
card.text: Dauntless deals 2 energy damage to up to 2 targets. Until the start of your next turn, whenever those targets would deal damage, redirect that damage to Dauntless

card.name: Heroic Image
card.text: Whenever Dauntless would be dealt exactly 1 damage, prevent that damage. Whenever one of Dauntless' cards would be destroyed, Dauntless may destroy this card instead

card.name: Glorious Stand
card.text: Whenever a hero target would be damaged, redirect the damage to Dauntless. At the start of your turn, destroy this card

card.name: Crackling Corona
card.text: Whenever a non-hero target causes a hero to discard cards, Dauntless may destroy this card to prevent that hero discarding any cards

card.name: Carry the Charge
card.text: Whenever Dauntless is dealt energy damage, he may play a card
